image_metadata.caption: Flowers are an example of the Fibonacci sequence in nature. The Fibonacci sequence is a classic example of a recursive function, as discussed in lectures 15 and 16. (Image courtesy of [Arthur T. LaBar](https://flic.kr/p/2hb11de) on Flickr. License: CC BY.)
image_metadata.credit: Image courtesy of [Arthur T. LaBar](https://flic.kr/p/2hb11de) on Flickr. License: CC BY.
image_metadata.image-alt: Closeup of sunflower petals and seeds.
